Package fotoshop.GUI

Package containing the graphical user interface components of the application.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CachePanel
    A JPanel for displaying the a cache of stored images.
    GUI
    The main GUI JFrame of the fotoshop application.
    ImagePanel
    JPanel for displaying the image in the main GUI
    UndoPanel
    Panel for displaying past instances of the current working image and allowing the user to select an image to be restored.

Package fotoshop.GUI Description

Package containing the graphical user interface components of the application.
See Also:
GUI: The main JFrame of the application. Initialised by adding other relevant gui components, and contains methods for updating these components.

ImagePanel: JPanel for displaying an image in the application window.

CachePanel: JPanel for displaying the image cache and allowing images to be stored in, or retrieved from this cache..

UndoPanel: JPanel for displaying a list of previous instances of the current image, and allow the user to return to these instances, undoing the filters applied.

MenuBar: Package containing the components for the GUI JFrames JMenuBar.

SequencePanel: Package containing the components for the sequence panel: A panel allowing one of a number of sequences of filters to be applied to the image, and the creation of new sequences.
